collection1.name: Behavioral Interview Prep
collection1.description: A curated set of questions focused on preparing for behavioral co-op interviews, including common questions and tips.

collection2.name: Resume & Networking Tips
collection2.description: Questions related to tailoring resumes, networking at info sessions, and standing out as a candidate.

collection3.name: Company Culture Insights
collection3.description: Questions helping students understand company culture, team dynamics, and fit before accepting offers.

collection4.name: Internship Essentials
collection4.description: Essential questions about LinkedIn, networking, and preparing for co-ops.

collection5.name: Time Management & Work-Life Balance
collection5.description: Questions on managing co-op work with classes and avoiding burnout.

collection6.name: Interview & Career Growth
collection6.description: A mix of questions covering interview prep, networking, and workplace fit.

collection7.name: Professional Development
collection7.description: Questions aimed at improving co-op experiences and advancing skills in the workplace.
